postReview.title: Liverpool 3-1 Southampton: Salah scores two penalties in comeback win
postReview.description: Liverpool launched a second-half fightback to beat Southampton in the Premier League on Saturday, with Mohamed Salah scoring two penalties.

preReview.title: Preview: Top vs. Bottom as Liverpool face Southampton

QAData.question: Who won between Liverpool and Southampton on Sat, 08 Mar 2025 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Liverpool won 3–1 over Southampton on Sat, 08 Mar 2025 15:00:00 GMT.
